options.description:
Shine is a modular administration mod for Natural Selection 2. It aims to be easy for admins to use and provide an easy to use framework for plugins.
For server owners, the Mod ID is: 706d242
Documentation (and the source code) can be found here: https://github.com/Person8880/Shine/wiki
If you find bugs or have problems, put an issue in the issue tracker on GitHub. That's where I'll be watching for problems.
If you're wondering about the name, well, so am I.
Changes (last updated 05/01/2013): Revision 5: - Added game IDs for player targetting. You can get them from sh_status.
Revision 4: - Fixed map cycle file not being readable in the mapvote plugin when using the combat mod.
Revision 3: - Made Shine compatible with Combat mode. No Lua edits are required, just make sure to set CombatMode = true in the base config file. Note that I haven't been able to thoroughly test this, let me know of any bugs/conflicts that arise.
